name: Bacon-Cheese Appetizer Toasts
author: Singer6
summary: A favorite a parties. The mixture freezes well so it can be prepared ahead of time.
ingredients: 1 cup shredded processed cheese food (such as Velveeta®)
directions: Mix processed cheese food, Cheddar cheese, bacon, Worcestershire sauce, and dry mustard together in a bowl
Butter both sides of each slice of bread and toast in skillet until browned, 1 to 2 minutes per side; arrange onto a baking sheet
Repeat toasting with remaining butter and bread slices
Set oven rack about 6 inches from the heat source and preheat the oven's broiler
Spoon cheese-and-bacon mixture atop the toasts
Arrange toasts on a baking sheet
Heat toasts under the broiler until the topping is hot and bubbling, about 2 minutes
